title: Role-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning on social themes in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively in remote collaborative learning processes using role-assignment scripts.
Learners enhance their role-based responsibility performance when completing PBL tasks related to social issues.
Learners can evaluate peers' expertise levels and provide feedback during collaborative processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
